verbose_text: The notion that miR-125a expression could be gradually lost during commitment, along with the reported involvement of this miRNA in the maintenance of hematopoietic stem cell number XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR and its differential overexpression in patient BM suggested by our previous results, lead us to hypothesize that miR-125a could be responsible for some of the differentiation abnormalities characteristic of MDS.
